snippet.title: Death Trick: Double Blind - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Join members of the development team for a deep dive into Death Trick: Double Blind, including a look at the characters, the double-perspective mechanic, and more from this upcoming non-linear detective game. In Death Trick: Double Blind, the star magician of Morgan’s Traveling Circus has vanished, but the show must go on. An unlikely duo must gather clues, question suspects, and reveal contradictions to unravel the mystery of the missing magician. A demo is available now on Steam and Itch.io

#GameTrailers #SoG
